nodes.bodyText: For maven it is hard to add multiple activating conditions so on master branch, the hadoop-3.0 profile can only be actived without specifying hadoop.profile. In general, using -Phadoop-3.0 should work on all branches but seems we have an enforcer rule for checking the property. Let me take a look.
